title: Beautiful wife trapped in a trap - Aimi Yoshikawa
overview: 「Every day, I was forced to operate a secret brothel in my room, with my husband right next to me... I continued to provide sexual services to strange men in lewd poses and to be embraced by them...」Aimi is a young wife with a plump bust, but an innocent face. Although they are not rich, they live modestly and happily with their kind husband Hiroyuki. However, due to the recent recession, Hiroyuki's salary has been reduced, and recently they have become so poor that they can't even eat properly... Hiroyuki, not wanting Aimi to suffer, has secretly borrowed money from a loan shark. However, the loan shark was run by a gangster. Kudo, the president of the loan shark, visits the couple's apartment and suggests to the frightened Aimi that "if she works as a brothel, she can pay off her debt quickly."
